data.title: Church at The Well
data.text:
God is Building a Well in Maryland New Here?Watch

Sundays, 10:00 a.m.

8600 Loch Raven Blvd.

Baltimore, MD 21286

Sundays at The Well

The Well is a church plant passionate about celebrating who God is and what he’s doing in our lives by sharing the hope of the Gospel. Join us on a Sunday!

Get Involved

Be a part of The Well community by joining a small group (Community Circles).

Bible Reading Plan

We are a church that is passionate about reading and knowing God’s Word. It is with this in mind that we’ve designed two daily Bible reading plans.

Our Mission

At Church at The Well, our mission is to reach Towson, MD with the hope of the Living Water.

We have a passion for the greater Baltimore area where there are 1.5 million people who don’t know Christ. In John 4, Jesus meets the woman at The Well. He embraces her without judgment and calls himself the Messiah, the Living Water. Just as Jesus poured himself out for the woman at the well, he is still the living water we need now to live a full and joy-filled life.

Our purpose

Together, we help people become followers of Jesus.

Our Core values

Serve, Saturate, and Send

We believe these three key call to action words encompass Jesus’ interaction with the Samaritan woman at the Well in John 4 as well as our commission as believers.

our vision

Church at The Well

Hear from Pastor Dayne Carraway as he shares his passion for the greater Baltimore area and the launch of Church at The Well!

Creation . Redemption . Restoration .

Passionate about Jesus in truth, relationship, and mission.

What We Believe

Get Involved

Join Us At An Event!

Sundays at The Well

10:00 a.m.

8600 Loch Raven Blvd., Baltimore, MD 21286

Join us on Sundays for an upbeat service of music and applicable teaching from the Bible.

The dress for our time together is casual so feel free to come as you are.

Community Circles

Wednesday and Tuesday Nights

Join us at a Community Circle to engage with people from our church and community in a no-pressure, social atmosphere. We are living life together in meaningful relationships and we hope you’ll join us!
